body_html:
That's odd. It's not getting installed as part of pip install torch. Quick repro:

$ docker run -it --network=host debian:jessie
# apt update -qq
# apt install -y python2.7 python2.7-dev python-pip python-requests
# pip install -U pip
# /usr/local/bin/pip install torch_nightly -v -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly.html
# /usr/local/bin/pip freeze | grep future

body:
That's odd.  It's not getting installed as part of `pip install torch`. Quick repro:

```
$ docker run -it --network=host debian:jessie
# apt update -qq
# apt install -y python2.7 python2.7-dev python-pip python-requests
# pip install -U pip
# /usr/local/bin/pip install torch_nightly -v -f https://download.pytorch.org/whl/nightly/cpu/torch_nightly.html
# /usr/local/bin/pip freeze | grep future
```
